CustomField.description: The field indicates the Serial Number in Text form. This will be used to find the proper Stock Serial under the product stock. Either this field or "Stock Serial" need to be populated in case if product is Serialized in order to get proper data.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The field indicates the Serial Number in Text form. This will be used to find the proper Stock Serial under the product stock. Either this field or "Stock Serial" need to be populated in case if product is Serialized in order to get proper data.
CustomField.label: Serial Number
